    Hello,

    I am writing to you hoping that you can create a helpful review on your blog about our work productivity tool called iJobo. It is a kind of product for freelancers that allows them to monitor their activity on their PC to create a comprehensive time sheet for employers.

    In this regard, I am offering you three different ways of knowing more about the product itself:

    1. Visit our official website (http://www.ijobo.com).
    2. Create your own trial account (it’s free) or directly use our demo account with demoaccount as username and demoaccount123 as password.
    3. See press release material below for your reference.

    Thank you in advance and kindly contact me for further inquiries.

    –
    Lisa Taylor
    Online Marketing Division
    lisa@ijobo.com

    PRESS RELEASE

    As a freelance employee, you may be always dealing with two major concerns: first, how to transmit your commitment and professionalism to your potential clients and second, how to increase level of confidence so they stick with you and compensate you more.

    However, if you think about it, what really matters is not how good you think you are at work, but HOW EFFICIENT YOU WORK IN THE EYES OF PEOPLE YOU WORK FOR.

    The three main ‚ÄòR‚Äô words for freelance work are Reputation, Reputation and Reputation.

    If you get paid for your actual hours worked, you can boost dramatically your credibility by showing your client what you do every minute by using a productivity tracking tool such as iJobo.

    With iJobo, you will raise your client‚Äôs perceived value and build up your client‚Äôs loyalty by an average of 30%.

    You get all of these benefits just by installing an intuitive software program that records what you do every minute on your computer and creates a comprehensive report for your client to evaluate.

    You can even select which windows in your computer belong to PRIVACY mode in order to prevent iJobo from recording personal conversations or activities not related to work. If any personal activity, however, has been recorded just login to your account and remove these data.

    iJobo is completely free for up to 2 users. Start now and be that model freelancer who is every company‚Äôs asset.

    REGISTER NOW FOR FREE!
